professional_summary: Expertise in Oracle Database Administration with extensive experience in RMAN administration, SQL tuning, and data migration.

key_responsibilities: Administering RMAN backups and maintaining database integrity.
Optimizing SQL queries to enhance performance.
Migrating data across environments during maintenance.
Managing RAC (Real Application Clusters) to ensure high availability.
Performing regular performance tuning and optimizing database instances.
Collaborating with storage teams for managing ASM disk groups.
Overseeing RMAN backup processes and maintaining database availability.
Administering ASM (Automatic Storage Management) for disk group management.
Managing cluster services to ensure seamless application operations.
